A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the most disappointing Star Wars movie to date.\nHow could you have such awesome build up to this movie and blow it so bad. So many plot holes and pointless characters\, some of the weakest deaths for some of the strongest characters in the Saga. It was so bad I cant stop complaining. I love Star Wars and this director just ruined it for me and so many real fans. Save your money!!!!!!
